user_instruction: 'Send Sarah an update on our current project status. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{
  "to": [
    "sarah@sterlingfinance.com"
  ],
  "subject": "Investment Strategy Presentation – Current Status Update",
  "body": "Hi Sarah,

Here’s a quick status check-in on our Investment-Strategy presentation:

Completed
• Core slide deck structure is laid out (introduction, strategy overview, asset-allocation approach, and performance-metric highlights).
• Latest macro-economic overview slides have been refreshed with the most recent quarterly figures.
• Preliminary charts and visuals have been slotted in across the deck.

In Progress
• Final tweaks to the asset-class performance slide are under way.
• I’m drafting concise speaker notes for the strategy and allocation sections.

Pending / Needs Your Input
• Could you please review the market-trends report in Notion and update the Market Trends section accordingly?
• Let me know if there are any other data points you’d like pulled for those slides.

Next Steps
• After your edits, we’ll do a full design polish to ensure formatting consistency.
• Let’s aim for an internal dry run early next week and freeze content a couple of days afterward.
• Final deck delivery to leadership is set for the end of next week.

Thanks for keeping this moving. Give me a shout if you need anything.

Best,
John"
}
